author: faywang
msg: OPENJPA-1857: fix the exception to be thrown by OpenJPA when wrong JoinColumn annotation is specified.

author: stefan2
msg: If we allocate stringbufs, their actual capacity allocated by APR
is often larger than requested. Take advantage of that by requesting
an enlarged buffer in the first place. Especially for short or empty
strings, this saves some re-allocations once they grow.
(svn_stringbuf_ncreate): allocate a buffer of aligned size

author: ppoddar
msg: OPENJPA-1851: First version of JEST (REST on OpenJPA)

author: stefan2
msg: Incorporate feedback I got on r985606.
(read_string): use symbolic name and explain the rationale behind the special case
